channel.title: Crash logger?
channel.description:
just wondering if there is a way to log a crash, like... unfixed exceptions
so while its running overnight, i no in the morning..?
example...
Crashed at 03:04:05. (shows the part of promt that shows where the crash happend at) end of crash report 03:04:05.
any ideas? :)
like make it write the thing and more importantly, no'in win it crashed then restarting server
aaaalso, any1 got a batch file that closed the server prompt, waits 10 seconds, then restarts server? :D

item.title: Crash logger?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

no i dont no where the excpetion wuld come from tho…
if i new, i wuld just fix it…

im asking like… if the server EVER throws an exception, it writes down wat caused it like… wat void caused it

so i can fix et

Read full topic

item.title: Crash logger?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Use a try-catch clause and log the exception to a file.

Read full topic
